title: Propulsion Assignment
description: This assignment covers the fundamental principles of rocket propulsion, including thrust, specific impulse, and fuel efficiency.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze different combustion processes and their efficiency in various rocket engines. Focus on optimizing fuel mixture ratios.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle for a rocket engine, considering factors such as exhaust velocity, nozzle shape, and material selection for thermal stress.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge on basic and advanced aerodynamics concepts, including lift, drag, and airflow over surfaces.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Conduct a detailed analysis of fluid flow around airfoils and objects in motion, using computational methods.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Examine thermal stresses and heating issues in high-speed aerospace vehicles, and propose solutions for effective thermal management.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design the structural components of an aerospace vehicle, focusing on load-bearing structures and materials selection.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for spacecraft, including velocity, altitude, and transfer orbits, for different mission profiles.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: This exam tests your understanding of systems engineering principles, including system integration, design optimization, and lifecycle management.
